DOC.brief_summary: The mechanism increase androgen production woman polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) well understood . Excess androgen production ovary stimulate increased pituitary luteinizing hormone ( LH ) secretion disorder . The investigator hypothesize PCOS woman ovarian theca cell , responsible androgen synthesis , sensitive LH stimulation compare theca cell normal woman . To test hypothesis , investigator propose conduct dose-response study androgen responses multiple dos human chorionic gonadotgropin ( hCG ) , LH surrogate , assess PCOS normal woman .
DOC.brief_title: Theca Cell Function Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS )
DOC.detailed_description: Each subject ( normal PCOS woman ) admit UCSD General Clinical Research Center ( GCRC ) study 5 occasion . All subject receive intravenous injection hCG dose 1 , 10 , 25 , 100 , 250 microgram , give one 5 different day separate least two week 8 AM . Blood sample obtain -0.5 , 0 , 0.5 , 24 hour injection . All visit GCRC do patient . The total amount blood withdrawn 35 teaspoon . For normal control subject period 4-6 month PCOS subject period 6-10 week .
DOC.criteria: Normal CBC ( Hemoglobin must least 11mg/dl ) Normal renal liver function test Normal vital sign include normal blood pressure No oral contraceptives No insulin lower drug No antiandrogens ( i.e. , spironolactone , flutamide , finasteride , etc ) No medication influence androgen metabolism clearance No medication inhibit cytochrome P450 enzyme system ( cimetidine , ketoconozole , etc ) No use clomiphene citrate within 3 month prior study
